about_the_game:
Kindlepath Watch is a turn-based RPG with dungeon crawling, town-building, and farming elements.

A small, dwarven mining village in the mountains has fallen under hard times since an outbreak of mysterious, plant-like creatures has stopped all mining operations. The village is on the brink of ruin; miners have been killed, the surviving villagers are without food, trade has stopped, buildings are in disrepair, and businesses are closed. Just when all hope is seemingly lost, two strangers arrive and offer their help. They come from different parts of the world and have their own reasons for taking on this task. One of the surviving miners decides to join the two strangers, and together this trio stands as the village's last hope.

Uncover The Story


Work with your party and other characters to discover how and why the creatures overtook the mine.

Deepen Party Relationships


A travelling sellsword, a vibrant elf, and a vengeful dwarf join together. Can they overcome their differences in order to save the village?

Classic Turn-Based Combat


As you explore the mine, engage in classic turn-based combat against a variety of enemies. Each party member has their own strengths and weaknesses; manage these to emerge victorious.

Fire is Your Friend


In the depths of the mine, darkness is everywhere. You must make use of fire in order to survive. Each party member utilizes fire in their own way, both in and out of combat. Too much reliance on fire in one area will leave you without it in the other.

Rebuild the Village


When not in combat in the mine, collect resources that you can use to rebuild the village. In doing so, you will receive various benefits in other areas of your adventure. You may also open new businesses that you can make use of. When the village prospers, so do you.

Grow Useful Plants


In the mine, collect seeds from plants and defeated enemies. Use these seeds back in the village to grow a variety of plants, all with different uses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 (or comparable AMD)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (or comparable AMD)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A small mining village has been overtaken by mysterious creatures from deep within the mine. Fight alongside your party members, consult with interesting characters, and work with the villagers themselves to vanquish the threat and restore the village to its former glory!
